document.full_text: nigerian president goodluck jonathan vowed on thursday that the country's final round of elections would go ahead next week despite rioting which has killed at least 100 people across the mostly-muslim north.
document.title: nigeria leader vows polls to continue despite riots
lines_and_colors: nigerian president goodluck jonathan vowed on thursday that the country's final round of elections would go ahead next week despite rioting which has killed at least 100 people across the mostly-muslim north.
